glsa.title: Utempter symlink vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: Utempter contains a vulnerability that may allow local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack.

background.p: Utempter is an application that allows non-privileged apps to write utmp (login) info, which otherwise needs root access.

description.p: Utempter contains a vulnerability that may allow local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack.

impact.p: This vulnerability may allow arbitrary files to be overwritten with root privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time. All users are advised to upgrade to the latest available version of utempter.

resolution.p: All users of utempter should upgrade to the latest stable version:
